newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle moderate at $103/dressed -USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle moderate at $103/dressed -USDA.

text.p: Trade was moderate, with slaughter steers and heifers fully steady both live and dressed basis sales when compared to Wednesday, USDA said.
Buyer interest good, seller interest mixed. Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink. Dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights)
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 63.00-64.00; Dressed basis mostly 102.00, few 103.00. ( weighted average 102.08).

Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1200 lbs few 64.25 delivered, few 62.00; Dressed basis mostly 102.00, few 100.00-101.50, few to 103.00. (weighted average 102.13). Confirmed - 4,800 Last Week - 3,700 Last Year - 4,400
Wk To Date- 83,800 Sm Pd Lst Wk- 111,200 Sm Pd Lst Yr- 83,900
Week ending June 12, 1997 Nebraska Feedlot Weekly Summary Confirmed - 83,800 Last Week - 111,200 Last Year - 83,900
Slaughter steers and heifers on a live basis 50-1.00 lower; Dressed basis 1.00-2.00 lower.

Trading was slow on Monday, some activity on Tuesday and moderate on Wednesday. Buyer inquiry and demand good with seller interest good. This week's sales volume included 25,100 previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Forward contracts - June July August September

Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1350 lbs. mostly 63.00, few to 64.00 delivered, few to 62.50; Dressed basis mostly 102.00, few 101.00-101.50 and 102.50-103.00. ( weighted average 1231 lbs.--101.96 ).

Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1250 lbs. mostly 63.00, few to 64.25 delivered, few to 62.00; Dressed basis mostly 101.50-102.00, few 100.00-101.00, few 102.50-103.00. ( weighted average 1127 lbs--101.92).
